Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.Controller

Class PizzaController

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.Controller.PizzaController
public class PizzaController extends Object
This class is in charge of modifying the elements of the pizza information box view The class gets the attributes of the pizzaModel to create an observable information box to show on screen
Author:
Santiago Caballero

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    getPizzaIngredientsInfo(Pizza pizza)
    This method gets all the ingredients name of the pizza ordered in a concatenated String
    private void
    setIngredientsViewList()
    This method sets the ingredients label list with the ingredients gotten from the pizzaModel the method sets the labels of ingredients just if the pizza has ingredients and append them to the ingredientsLabelList
    private void
    setPizzaAttributesHBox()
    This method instances a Horizontal box to add the ingredient list, the price, and the size of the pizza
    private javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    setPizzaInfoVBox(javafx.scene.layout.HBox horizontalBox)
    This method modifies the principal information box elements adding the title(name) and the attributes of the Horizontal box
    private void
    setPriceView()
    This method creates a label to set the text with the pizza price
    private void
    setSizeView()
    This method creates a label to set the text with the pizza size the method has a label with a text by default that is modified if the pizza has a size
    private void
    setTitleView()
    This method creates a label to set the text with the pizza name
    javafx.scene.layout.VBox
    showPizzaInformation()
    This method sets the ui elements with the model attributes to return the general information of the pizza

    • showPizzaInformation

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox showPizzaInformation()
      This method sets the ui elements with the model attributes to return the general information of the pizza
      Returns:
      returns the ui box with the general information of the pizza

    • setIngredientsViewList

      private void setIngredientsViewList()
      This method sets the ingredients label list with the ingredients gotten from the pizzaModel the method sets the labels of ingredients just if the pizza has ingredients and append them to the ingredientsLabelList

    • setPizzaInfoVBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox setPizzaInfoVBox(javafx.scene.layout.HBox horizontalBox)
      This method modifies the principal information box elements adding the title(name) and the attributes of the Horizontal box
      Parameters:
      horizontalBox - to add into the principal information Vbox
      Returns:
      the principal information Vbox

    • setPizzaAttributesHBox

      private void setPizzaAttributesHBox()
      This method instances a Horizontal box to add the ingredient list, the price, and the size of the pizza

      private void setPriceView()
      This method creates a label to set the text with the pizza price

    • setSizeView

      private void setSizeView()
      This method creates a label to set the text with the pizza size the method has a label with a text by default that is modified if the pizza has a size

      This method creates a label to set the text with the pizza name

    • getPizzaIngredientsInfo

      public String getPizzaIngredientsInfo(Pizza pizza)
      This method gets all the ingredients name of the pizza ordered in a concatenated String
      Parameters:
      pizza - the pizza ordered to get its ingredients
      Returns:
      a String with all the ingredients name
